column4: ok I just installed Ubuntu 12.04 on a sony vaio with intel 945g chipset (onboard audio) and the sound is VERY quiet
rez0r did you open a terminal and type alsamixer ?
click the speaker icon in the panel , tp make sure
paste your alsamixer in imagebin , so we can have look at it
it usually saves to the documents file
check your audio settings in the speaker icon
or open a terminal , sudo modprobe snd_hda_intel
what about system settings icon , there's an audio/sound control option there .
what do you think it's there for
in the terminal , sudo apt-get install ubuntu-restricted-extras
